note.p: Death: His house in Sackville Street (27 June 1834)

Career: Physician to the Fleet (1779-1783); Physician, St Thomas' Hospital (1783-1795); Physician Extraordinary to the Prince of Wales (1785); Physician in Ordinary to the King (George IV and William IV)
Authority: Date of birth from Munk's Roll
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1834-1835 No 18 pp 303-304
References: Garland Cannon, 'Sir William Jones, Sir Joseph Banks, and the Royal Society' in NR 1974-5 vol 29 pp 205-230
W P Griffith and P J T Morris, 'Charles Hatchett FRS (1765 - 1847), chemist and discoverer of niobium' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 299 - 316
Notes: DNB gives date of death as 26 June 1834.
